desc: Femme Fighter is a line of high quality boxing gloves for women. We work to empower women through boxing, self defense, and of course fitness! 10 percent of our profit goes towards charities involving victims of domestic violence and sex trafficking. We know you will love our brand and its cheeky, sassy, stylish gear.

layout.text: FemmeFighter is a Women Owned Fitness Brand that works to empower women through creating uniquely feminine, high quality, long nail friendly boxing gloves. Our designs fun and cheeky with unique limited edition styles, and a portion of our proceeds go towards charities involving victims of domestic abuse and human trafficking.
